::Shadow Wing::

She fixed and hooked up the CPU's and put in the boards.  She wired 
them in and hooked up a power supply line.  She went over and threw 
the switch.  The computer screen had flickered, went on, flickered, 
went off.  She sighed. "Come on Teletran, You just have to turn on."

The huge screen buzzed, then flickered and stayed on.  it was nothing 
but a blue screen.  But at least the screen was on.
